metas.description: The full result of the 2013 Cheltenham Gold cup including all the places and the starting prices for each horse in the first three.

page.content:
Cheltenham Gold Cup Result 2013

The full result of the 2013 Cheltenham Gold Cup will be here just as soon as the result comes in on Friday the 15th March. Synchronised won the race in 2012 and plenty of punters will be hoping he cane repeat the trick in 2013. Other potential runners in the race include 2011 winner Long Run and the exciting Sir Des Champs who won the Jewson Novices Chase at the Festival so well in 2012. A full review of the race will also be here on Gold Cup day with all the big incidents featured for punters to study when checking their bets.

Gold Cup Result 2013

The 2013 Gold Cup was won by Bobs Worth who has never lost at the Cheltenham course.

15:20 Betfred Cheltenham Gold Cup Chase (Grade 1) (Class 1, 3m 2f 110y)
1. Bobs Worth - B J Geraghty - N J Henderson 11/4 Fav
2. Sir Des Champs - A P McCoy - W P Mullins 4/1
3. Long Run - Mr S Waley-Cohen - N J Henderson 11/2
9 Ran
